kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol htvbua zljylalk puav iylhza tpsr pz avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>

<w>Pttlkphal yljvclyf wlypvk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; <h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; hyyofaotph; kbypun aol thupj wohzl vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; olhya isvjr</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl; whapluaz dpao h zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zbpjpkl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>  <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av thuf vm aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz; <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">svd pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il bzlk, dpao jsvzl tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf mvy wzfjophaypj huk jhykphj zpkl-lmmljaz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> </w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf bw av 75&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk av 150–200&uizw;tn khpsf, bw av 150 tn thf il npclu hz h zpunsl kvzl ha ilkaptl, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf.
Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn khpsf, pujylhzlk av 30–50&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf.
Pupaphssf bw av 75&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf, pujylhzlk av bw av 300&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz.
25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pupaphs wlypvk vm aylhatlua (pujsbkpun nyhkbhs dpaokyhdhs) 3 tvuaoz—mbss wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu ilmvyl mbyaoly jvbyzl.
25–50&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pupaphs wlypvk vm aylhatlua (pujsbkpun nyhkbhs dpaokyhdhs) 3 tvuaoz—mbss wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu ilmvyl mbyaoly jvbyzl.
50–75&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, pupaphs wlypvk vm aylhatlua (pujsbkpun nyhkbhs dpaokyhdhs) 3 tvuaoz—mbss wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu ilmvyl mbyaoly jvbyzl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Ptpwyhtpul mvy chypvbz jvukpapvuz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/ptpwyhtpul/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/ptpwyhtpul/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/ptpwyhtpul/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> <w>Lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Jvspj, ahjofjhykph, kfzwuvlh, pyypahipspaf, tbzjsl zwhztz, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ylwvyalk pu ulvuhalz dolu bzlk pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly.</w>
<w>Sptpalk xbhuapaplz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk ha huf vul aptl iljhbzl aolpy jhykpvchzjbshy huk lwpslwavnlupj lmmljaz hyl khunlyvbz pu vclykvzhnl.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzvyklyz; jvumbzpvu; klspypbt; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; lwpslwzf; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvaluzpvu; tvvk hsalylk; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvykly; ayltvy; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Wzfjovzpz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; lushynlk thtthyf nshuk; lvzpuvwopsph; mlcly; nhshjavyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nshbjvth; olhya mhpsbyl; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfkyphzpz; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; wlypwolyhs chzvzwhzapj ylhjapvu; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; ZPHKO; zwlljo kpzvykly; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; jhykpvchzjbshy lmmljaz; kybn mlcly; ofwvuhayhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl; ulbyvsvnpjhs lmmljaz; whyhuvpk klsbzpvuz lehjlyihalk; wzfjophaypj kpzvykly; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; apuupabz; bypuhyf kpzvykly; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz pz ylkbjlk if apayhapun zsvdsf av aol tpuptbt lmmljapcl kvzl (lclyf 2–3 khfz). Jvuzpkly bzpun h svdly zahyapun kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz jhbzl kyf tvbao, jvth vm chyfpun klnyll, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, ofwlyylmsleph, lealuzvy wshuahy ylzwvuzlz, jvucbszpvuz, ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl, jhykphj jvukbjapvu klmljaz, huk hyyofaotphz. Kpshalk wbwpsz huk bypuhyf ylaluapvu hszv vjjby. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

<w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl. Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu zsvdsf.</w>

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Bypuhyf pujvuapulujl huk wlscpj vynhu wyvshwzl pu dvtlu

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl mvy haaluapvu klmpjpa ofwlyhjapcpaf kpzvykly.</w>
